name: piper-wasm
description: Wasm Version of rhasspy/piper running locally in the browser

scripts.build: bun run build-worker-expression && bun run build-worker-piper && bun run copy-transformers-dist && bun run copy-onnx-1_17_0-dist
scripts.copy-transformers-dist: rm -rf build/worker/dist && mkdir -p build/worker/dist && cp -r node_modules/@xenova/transformers/dist/* build/worker/dist && cp -r node_modules/onnxruntime-web/dist/* build/worker/dist
scripts.copy-onnx-1_17_0-dist: rm -rf build/worker/dist/piper-dist && mkdir -p build/worker/dist/piper-dist && cp -r node_modules/onnxruntime-web_1.17.0/dist/* build/worker/dist/piper-dist

author: DavidCks
